channel.title: Help with a command from what i think it will be hard
channel.description: ok so i want to add a ::myshop command and make a simmilar system to a ge but when you type the command a shop pulls up and for example you sell a fury for 5m and then when someone right clicks on you they can click for example View Shop Dave then they will see the fury there and be able to buy it for 5m.i am using hybrid pvp v2 i think its the one where home is near yaks and they drop 5m....
